summary: Completed comprehensive testing of RichardEv Agente AI code generation interface. All major frontend features and design elements working correctly.
passed_tests: Interface loads correctly with RichardEv branding
Dark theme with purple accents properly implemented
All three example buttons functional (Validar CPF, API REST, Componente React)
Input field accepts and handles user input correctly
Send button state management works (enabled/disabled based on input)
Sidebar shows/hides appropriately on different viewport sizes
External API integration functional (loading states working)
Lucide React icons properly implemented (no emojis)
CSS custom properties and theming working
Google Fonts (Inter, JetBrains Mono, Outfit) loading correctly
